snippet.title: Tavern Legends - First Gameplay!
snippet.description:
=== Tavern Legends ===
Add to your wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3160880/Tavern_Legends/

Tavern Legends is a medieval tavern simulation. Fulfill the needs of various patrons and design taverns according to your vision. Create your own meals, manage your inventory, and hire workers. Become a legendary tavern keeper!

=== CROWFORGE Games ===
More info on https://www.crowforge-games.com/
visit the STEAM shop site, direct link is on website.

=== RoarBack Studio ===
Music by ‪@RoarBackStudio‬ visit his channel to get into his beautiful work
